title: Home
welcome: I am a second-year M.Sc. student at Osaka University, Japan and am project researcher at SANKEN (The Institute of Scientific and Industrial Research at Osaka University). I am interested in (RQ1) real-time forecasting and (RQ2) causal discovery in time-series data. I am fortunate to be advised by <link_yasushi>Prof. Yasushi Sakurai</link_yasushi> and <link_yasuko>Prof. Yasuko Matsubara</link_yasuko> at SANKEN. I recieved my B.Sc. degrees from Osaka University advised by <link_makoto>Prof. Makoto Onizuka</link_makoto> in March, 2023. I am participating in <link_hwip>Humanware Innovation Program</link_hwip> to deepen my knowledge in other fields.
profile: I am a M.Sc. student at Osaka University, Japan. I am interested in time-series analysis.
